department: Public Works and Government Services(PSPC) Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: This auction is seeking to acquire one high-speed centrifuge and four(4) rotors and the appropriate accessories for it. This equipment is a crucial laboratory apparatus needed to conduct molecular biology and biochemistry tests.
description: The request is for one (1) high-speed centrifuge with four (4) rotors and accessories to help in testing of how proteins interact and form methods for products. The equipment is critical since the procedures included involve sensitive work such as isolating proteins, studying cells and understanding biological processes. Interested individuals can only bid if they provide details showing compliance with all technical criteria required as stated in the plans. Any bid lacking information on compliance criteria will be disregarded.
duration_in_months: It is estimated that the contract will last for 15 months
full_summary:
##### Request for Proposal: High Speed Centrifuge

**Request Details:**

* **Title:** High Speed Centrifuge
* **Reference Number:** WS3743439487-Doc3821145020
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3743439487
* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 9, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 12, 2024

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from interested bidders for the procurement of one High Speed Centrifuge, complete with four (4) rotors and accessories. This laboratory equipment is essential for performing molecular biology and biochemistry experiments, including clarification of protein extracts, large-scale nucleic acid purification, protein precipitation, and subcellular fractionation.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**

Proposals must clearly demonstrate compliance with the following mandatory technical criteria:

* Correct caliber for the laboratory poles and distribution centering me entrada/F
